00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_K_HEAP_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_K_HEAP_H_
00029 
00030 // Include the std::less predicate (used by default).
00031 #include <functional>
00032 
00033 // Include indirect heaps and traits information.
00034 #include "indirect_heap.h"
00035 #include "traits.h"
00036 
00037 namespace kche_tree {
00038 
00047 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T> >
00048 class KHeap {
00049 public:
00050 
00051   // Constructors and destructors.
00052   KHeap(unsigned int k); 
00053   KHeap(const KHeap &heap); 
00054   ~KHeap(); 
00055 
00056   // Assignment operator.
00057   KHeap &operator =(const KHeap &heap); 
00058 
00059   // Comparison operator.
00060   bool operator ==(const KHeap &heap) const; 
00061 
00062   // Heap operations.
00063   bool push(const T &elem); 
00064   void pop_best(); 
00065   void pop_worst(); 
00066 
00067   // Heap properties.
00068   bool full() const; 
00069   bool empty() const; 
00070   unsigned int size() const; 
00071 
00072   const T &best() const; 
00073   const T &worst() const; 
00074 
00075   unsigned int get_K() const; 
00076   unsigned int count() const; 
00077 
00078 
00079   // STL-based names for heap operations and properties.
00080   bool push_front(const T &elem) { return push(elem); } 
00081   bool push_back (const T &elem) { return push(elem); } 
00082 
00083   void pop_front() { pop_worst(); } 
00084   void pop_back()  { pop_best(); } 
00085 
00086   const T &front() const { return worst();  } 
00087   const T &back()  const { return best(); } 
00088 
00089 
00090 protected:
00091   unsigned int K; 
00092   T *data; 
00093 
00094   const Compare &compare; 
00095   static const unsigned int root = 1; 
00096 
00097   IndirectHeap<T, Compare, unsigned int> bestHeap; 
00098   IndirectHeap<T, std::binary_negate<Compare>, unsigned int> worstHeap; 
00099 };
00100 
00101 } // namespace kche_tree

00103 // Template implementation.
00104 #include "k-heap.tpp"
